byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.longDescription: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. It provides a secure way to utilize these devices while in the rear seat of your BMW. This product is used in conjunction with our sturdy base carrier, which utilizes a modular plug connector. The holder can be easily clipped into the frame of the holder, which rotates 360° (optimal for watching films, viewing photos, composing e-mails, Facebook, Twitter, etc). Not for vehicles equipped with optional factory rear seat entertainment or optional sport seats. Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
byooption.name: BMW iPad Holder

Shown with smartphone mounted with the BMW Click & Drive System (sold separately).  This is an accessory product and prices excludes installation and taxes. byooption.longDescription: The BMW Kayak Carrier can hold a variety of single-occupant watercrafts up to 34" wide and/or 75 lb, and features a lockable folding mechanism for increased overhead clearance when not in use. Fully adjustable, premium padding gently cradles and protects the watercraft, ensuring snug & secure positioning during transit and is constructed of ultra-strong, steel tubing construction with a rust-resistant powder-coat finish.  A base support system is required for mounting the Kayak Carrier to the roof rails.  This is an accessory product and prices excludes installation and taxes.  Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change.

byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2017 BMW 330e iPerformance models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $389 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $39,286 (MSRP of $46,745, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $3,000 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $1,459 and $3,000 Lease Credit).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual monthly lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $3,000 down payment, $389 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.25/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $28,982.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.longDescription: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
byooption.name: Navigation system

byooption.longDescription: Added to Navigation option, ARTTI now offers more coverage and precision using an extensive sensor network and vehicle’s mobile network data connections bring this information to vehicle faster.
byooption.name: Advanced Real-Time Traffic Information

conflictAddOptions.description: Added to Navigation option, ARTTI now offers more coverage and precision using an extensive sensor network and vehicle’s mobile network data connections bring this information to vehicle faster.
conflictAddOptions.name: Advanced Real-Time Traffic Information

Business and stock market news, weather updates are made available.  With services such as Google Local Search you have access to telephone directories, restaurant and hotel guides.  You receive exclusive, location-based information on everything you need to know about your route or destination.

byooption.longDescription: Non-sport seats feature less aggressive bolstering than Sport seats, while still providing both comfort and support for longer journeys.
byooption.name: Non Sport Seats for Luxury Package

byooption.longDescription: Chrome design elements create an atmosphere of elegance with the Luxury Package.  They add a stylish accent to the bumper, air intakes, kidney bars, window surround and exhaust pipe finishers.
byooption.name: Luxury Package

byooption.longDescription: Harman Kardon surround sound system is a 16-speaker, multi-channel system that makes the car's cabin a colorful sound experience.
byooption.name: Harman Kardon surround sound system

options.description: Harman Kardon surround sound system is a 16-speaker, multi-channel system that makes the car's cabin a colorful sound experience.

byooption.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.
byooption.longDescription: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.
byooption.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

byooption.longDescription: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
byooption.name: Navigation system

conflictAddOptions.description: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
conflictAddOptions.name: Navigation system

byooption.longDescription: Enhances your mobility by connecting you to the most up-to-date information while you are at the wheel.  Business and stock market news, weather updates are made available.  With services such as Google Local Search you have access to telephone directories, restaurant and hotel guides.  You receive exclusive, location-based information on everything you need to know about your route or destination.
byooption.name: BMW Online and BMW Apps

byooption.longDescription: The BMW M Performance Side Stripes customize and accentuate the sporty characteristics of your BMW. These black and silver stripes fit perfectly over the left and right panels of the vehicle. Digitally printed on a high-quality PVC (Polyvinyl Chloride) film.

byooption.longDescription: These stripes help accentuate the already stunning performance of your BMW with a bold and sporty visual statement.
byooption.name: M colored bumper stripes

options.name: M colored bumper stripes

byooption.longDescription: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead with limited-force automated braking - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Frontal Collision Warning: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes engage.  DISCLAIMER: This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility. Due to the road, traffic and visibility conditions, the driver decides whether and how the system is used.
byooption.name: Active Cruise Control

options.description: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead with limited-force automated braking - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Frontal Collision Warning: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes engage.  DISCLAIMER: This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility. Due to the road, traffic and visibility conditions, the driver decides whether and how the system is used.
options.name: Active Cruise Control

byooption.longDescription: Seeing a wide-angle view of your surroundings in the Control Display makes it easier to maneuver in tight spaces and avoid pulling into unseen traffic when emerging from a garage.
byooption.name: Side and Top View Cameras

byooption.longDescription: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; using ultrasonic sensors in front and rear bumpers helps judge distance to other vehicles and objects.
byooption.name: Driving Assistance Package

conflictAddOptions.description: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; using ultrasonic sensors in front and rear bumpers helps judge distance to other vehicles and objects.
conflictAddOptions.name: Driving Assistance Package

byooption.longDescription: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
byooption.name: Park Distance Control

conflictAddOptions.description: Park Distance Control uses ultrasonic sensors in the front and rear bumpers to help you judge the distance to other vehicles and unseen objects when parking. The system uses an audible warning that beeps faster the closer you get to an object, turning into a constant tone when the distance is less than 12 inches.
conflictAddOptions.name: Park Distance Control

byooption.longDescription: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. Working in conjunction with Park Distance Control, interactive guidelines can indicate lines that represent the vehicle’s actual path when backing up, as well as the optimal steering angle.
byooption.name: Rear view camera

conflictAddOptions.description: The Rear-view Camera clearly shows, in the Control Display, the area behind the vehicle. options.name: Side and Top View Cameras

byooption.longDescription: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering as you select the correct gear and control the accelerator and brake.
byooption.name: Parking Assistant

byooption.longDescription: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of Important safety features.  Frontal Collision and Pedestrian Warning with City Collision Mitigation provides limited-force automated braking within low speed situations.  Lane Departure Warning employs a camera system which monitors road lane markings. Anytime the vehicle begins to move across a lane marking without the turn signals activated, this system vibrates the steering wheel. Correct operation is predicated on clear lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow or other masking factors.
byooption.name: Active Driving Assistant

options.description: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of Important safety features.  Frontal Collision and Pedestrian Warning with City Collision Mitigation provides limited-force automated braking within low speed situations.  Lane Departure Warning employs a camera system which monitors road lane markings. Anytime the vehicle begins to move across a lane marking without the turn signals activated, this system vibrates the steering wheel. Correct operation is predicated on clear lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow or other masking factors.
options.name: Active Driving Assistant

byooption.longDescription: OK to change lanes? With this feature, a warning triangle in your side-view mirror lights up if there’s a vehicle in your blind spot or approaching at a high speed. If you then start to cross lanes, you will feel a slight vibration in your steering wheel - a secondary caution to remain in your lane.
byooption.name: Active Blind Spot Detection

options.description: OK to change lanes? With this feature, a warning triangle in your side-view mirror lights up if there’s a vehicle in your blind spot or approaching at a high speed. If you then start to cross lanes, you will feel a slight vibration in your steering wheel - a secondary caution to remain in your lane.
options.name: Active Blind Spot Detection

byooption.longDescription: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display and, if so equipped, Head-up Display.
byooption.name: Speed Limit Info

options.description: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display and, if so equipped, Head-up Display.

options.name: Speed Limit Info

byooption.longDescription: Don’t just illuminate the road - enhance your nighttime driving confidence. Bright LED headlights turn to follow the curves in the road ahead, helping to reveal any roadside surprises around the bend. For added convenience, high beams can also be automatically turned on and off, as needed.
byooption.name: Lighting Package

packages.description: Don’t just illuminate the road - enhance your nighttime driving confidence. Bright LED headlights turn to follow the curves in the road ahead, helping to reveal any roadside surprises around the bend. For added convenience, high beams can also be automatically turned on and off, as needed.
packages.name: Lighting Package

byooption.longDescription: LED headlights make everything on and along the road easier to see, helping to reduce eye fatigue - especially on long drives. LED technology is used for both high and low beams, as well as all 4 Corona headlight-rings. This technology is combined with the Adaptive feature: at speeds up to 35 mph, the headlights swivel to follow bends in the road, based on your steering wheel motion and other metrics.
byooption.name: Adaptive Full LED Lights

options.description: LED headlights make everything on and along the road easier to see, helping to reduce eye fatigue - especially on long drives. LED technology is used for both high and low beams, as well as all 4 Corona headlight-rings. This technology is combined with the Adaptive feature: at speeds up to 35 mph, the headlights swivel to follow bends in the road, based on your steering wheel motion and other metrics.
options.name: Adaptive Full LED Lights

byooption.longDescription: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. A camera sensor in the rear-view mirror registers vehicles in front of you, oncoming traffic and the quality of road light, and automatically switches between high or low beams, as needed. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.
byooption.name: Automatic high beams

options.description: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.
options.name: Automatic high beams

byooption.longDescription: The Premium Package takes your driving experience to the next level. LED headlights delivering the whitest, most attractive illumination, a moonroof for fresh air experiences, and SiriusXM® Satellite Radio for your listening pleasure. Topping it all off: the daily convenience of Comfort Access.

byooption.disclaimer: SiriusXM services require a subscription after trial period. If you decide to continue your service at the end of your trial subscription, the plan you choose will automatically renew and bill at then-current  rates until you call 1-866-635-2349 to cancel. See SiriusXM Customer Agreement for complete terms at siriusxm.com.
byooption.longDescription: SiriusXM-equipped BMWs come with a 1-year trial to the Sirius All Access package.  You'll hear every SiriusXM channel available in your BMW, including commercial-free music, plus all your favorite sports, exclusive talk, entertainment and all of our premium programming.  Plus you'll get SiriusXM Internet Radio, so you can bring SiriusXM with you wherever you go - on your computer, smartphone and tablet.  Welcome to the world of SiriusXM.
byooption.name: SiriusXM Satellite Radio with 1year All Access Subscription

byooption.disclaimer: Foot must be on brake or, with manual transmission, must also depress the clutch in order to start.
byooption.longDescription: Offers convenient keyless access to your vehicle by carrying the remote key in a pocket or purse.  Unlock doors by touching the handle.
byooption.name: Comfort Access keyless entry

byooption.longDescription: 2-way power glass moonroof with 1-touch operation slides back or tilts up to let in as much fresh air and sky as you like, while a wind deflector helps keep strong breezes out.
byooption.name: Moonroof

byooption.longDescription: So connected, you're free.  This package encompasses selected ConnectedDrive features which will provide flexibility and access to the outside world more conveniently.
byooption.name: Technology Package

packages.description: So connected, you're free.  This package encompasses selected ConnectedDrive features which will provide flexibility and access to the outside world more conveniently.
packages.name: Technology Package

byooption.longDescription: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
byooption.name: Navigation system

options.description: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display. options.name: Navigation system

byooption.longDescription: The Head-up Display projects a multi-color image that seems to float beyond the windshield, just below your line of vision. It allows you to monitor preferred travel information, such as current speed, BMW Navigation system directional arrows, posted Speed Limit, Check Control data and more - without taking your eyes off the road.  Some features, such as Speed Limit Info and Navigation, may be optional equipment.
byooption.name: Head-up Display

options.description: The Head-up Display projects a multi-color image that seems to float beyond the windshield, just below your line of vision. options.name: Head-up Display

byooption.longDescription: The new BMW Connected App is the solution for beginning-to-end trip planning. Send destinations to your BMW from a cell phone or watch and this intelligent travel assistant will learn driving patterns and recommend departure times so you’re never late. Share arrival times with family and friends, find the nearest parking garage, and control important vehicle functions remotely; like locking your doors.\n
byooption.name: BMW Connected App Compatibility

byooption.longDescription: Added to Navigation option, ARTTI now offers more coverage and precision using an extensive sensor network and vehicle’s mobile network data connections bring this information to vehicle faster.
byooption.name: Advanced Real-Time Traffic Information

byooption.longDescription: Enhances your mobility by connecting you to the most up-to-date information while you are at the wheel.  Business and stock market news, weather updates are made available.  With services such as Google Local Search you have access to telephone directories, restaurant and hotel guides.  You receive exclusive, location-based information on everything you need to know about your route or destination.
byooption.name: BMW Online and BMW Apps
